comment: No complaints with this professor or course. Assignments were straight-forward, resources were concise, and professor always gave great feedback. Do your best, be aware of due dates (especially for discussions!), and you will have no issues with this professor.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: This was the first time I have ever taken Professor Luther. He gives great feedback, quick grading, and is very responsive. He is fair with grades. 7 Assignments, 4 Quizzes, 3 Discussions, Mid-Term, and Term Project. Each Modules is about 2 weeks. I would take his professor again!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read
